pkgmetadata.longdescription: ###########jwtlib###########.. readme_inclusion_markerDev setup~~~~~~~~~Initialize local repository---------------------------.. code-block:: bash $ poetry install $ poetry shell # Open shell within the virtualenvAvailable commands------------------.. code-block:: bash $ peltak --help # Show the list of available commands $ peltak test # Run tests $ peltak check # Run code checks $ peltak docs # Build documentation using SphinxRelease new version-------------------While on master branch, you can release the current state of it by running.. code-block:: bash peltak release create # Create a patch release peltak release create -t patch # Create a patch release peltak release create -t minor # Create a minor release peltak release create -t major # Create a major release
